column1: you rarely turn in homework, and I think you would benefit from doing the homework because it would help you deepen your understanding of the course material.
column2: you sometimes turn in homework, and I think you would benefit from doing the homework more often because it would help you deepen your understanding of the course material.
column3: you often turn in homework, and I think you are doing great in this respect.
column4: you always turn in homework, and I applaud your dedication to the course!
